mapper.select: select c.id, c.cust_id, c.item_id, c.cnt, c.rdate , cu.name AS cust_name, it.name AS item_name, it.price AS item_price, it.imgname AS item_imgname from cart c, cust cu, item it where c.cust_id = cu.id and c.item_id = it.id and c.id = #{id}

select c.id, c.cust_id, c.item_id, c.cnt, c.rdate , cu.name AS cust_name, it.name AS item_name, it.price AS item_price, it.imgname AS item_imgname from cart c, cust cu, item it where c.cust_id = cu.id and c.item_id = it.id and c.cust_id = #{cid}

select c.id, c.cust_id, c.item_id, c.cnt, c.rdate , cu.name AS cust_name, it.name AS item_name, it.price AS item_price, it.imgname AS item_imgname from cart c, cust cu, item it where c.cust_id = cu.id and c.item_id = it.id
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart USING dual ON (cust_id = #{cust_id} AND item_id = #{item_id}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id,cust_id,item_id,cnt,rdate) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cust_id}, #{item_id}, #{cnt}, SYSDATE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cnt = cnt+ #{cnt}
